title: Rahu Transit in the 7th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the 7th house for Taurus Ascendant brings intense focus on partnerships, relationships, and public interactions. This phase heightens desire for companionship, recognition through others, and unconventional alliances. Attraction can feel sudden and consuming, yet clarity may fluctuate, creating confusion in commitments. Business partnerships may involve foreign, unconventional, or high-risk elements. While Rahu amplifies charm and negotiation power, imbalance can lead to misunderstandings. Conscious boundaries and transparency help transform this transit into strategic relational growth.
closing: Rahu in the 7th house magnifies relationship desire and influence. Clear boundaries and transparency convert attraction into stable, purposeful partnerships.
